1.41: E^li^saa^mbetc yietv haiz Maa^li^yaa nyei qiex, gu'nguaaz yiem ga'sie dongz duqv seix haic. E^li^saa^mbetc yaac duqv Singx Lingh buangv nzengc hnyouv
1.13: Fin-mienh mbuox ninh, “Se^kaa^li^yaa aah! Meih maiv dungx gamh nziex oc. Dongh meih tov Tin-Hungh wuov deix waac, Tin-Hungh haiz mi'aqv. Meih nyei m'sieqv dorn, E^li^saa^mbetc, oix maaih dauh dorn. Oix zuqc gan ninh cuotv mbuox heuc Yo^han.
1.60: Mv baac ninh nyei maa gorngv, “Maiv zeiz lorqc. Ninh nyei mbuox oix zuqc heuc Yo^han.”
1.59: Gu'nguaaz cuotv seix daaih duqv hietc hnoi, oix jiex gaatv nyei leiz wuov zanc, mienh oix tengx gu'nguaaz cuotv mbuox heuc nitv ninh nyei die, Se^kaa^li^yaa.
1.70: hnangv loz-hnoi Tin-Hungh longc ninh nyei cing-nzengc douc waac mienh gorngv nyei waac.
1.77: Oix zuqc bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx hiuv duqv ninh mbuo duqv njoux se weic zuqc duqv ninh mbuo nyei zuiz guangc liuz.
1.40: Mingh taux, ninh ziouc bieqc Se^kaa^li^yaa nyei biauv caux E^li^saa^mbetc gorngv wuic buangh waac.
1.55: Ninh ei ninh caux mbuo nyei ong-taaix laengz liuz nyei waac tengx ninh nyei bou, I^saa^laa^en. Ninh korv-lienh Apc^laa^ham, yaac yietc liuz korv-lienh Apc^laa^ham nyei zeiv-fun.”
1.26: E^li^saa^mbetc maaih jienv sin duqv juqv hlaax nyieqc, Tin-Hungh paaiv Gaa^mbe^lien wuov dauh fin-mienh mingh taux Gaa^li^li Saengv, Naa^saa^letv Mungv,
1.52: Zoux hlo nyei mienh, ninh tutv njiec weic, zoux faix wuov deix, ninh bouh faaux hlang.
1.14: Meih ziouc njien-youh, orn-lorqc haic. Naaiv dauh fu'jueiv cuotv seix, mienh camv yaac a'hneiv haic.
1.27: douc fienx mbuox dauh sieqv, mbuox heuc Maa^li^yaa. Maaih dauh Ndaawitv Hungh nyei Zeiv-Fun, mbuox heuc Yosepv, daaih gorngv ziangh ninh mi'aqv.
1.38: Maa^li^yaa dau, “Yie zoux Ziouv nyei bou. M'daaih oix zuqc hnangv meih gorngv nor aqv.” Gorngv liuz naaiv deix waac, fin-mienh mingh mi'aqv.
1.74: Ninh gorngv ninh oix bun yiem mbuo nyei win-wangv nyei buoz-ndiev biaux cuotv daaih buoqc zaangc ninh, maiv zuqc gamh nziex haaix nyungc,
1.49: weic zuqc Maaih Domh Qaqv nyei Tin-Hungh ceix mbuoqc horngh haic nyei sic bun yie. Ninh nyei mbuox se cing-nzengc haic.
1.66: Haiz liuz nyei mienh zorqv naaiv deix sic an jienv hnyouv hnamv, “Aa, naaiv dauh fu'jueiv hlo daaih benx haaix nyungc mienh ni?” Weic zuqc mengh mengh baeqc baeqc nyei buatc jienv Ziouv caux ninh yiem.
1.36: Meih hnamv mangc gaax meih nyei cien-ceqv, E^li^saa^mbetc. Mienh gorngv ninh maiv haih maaih gu'nguaaz. Ih zanc ninh ndongc naaic gox mv baac ninh zungv maaih jienv sin duqv juqv hlaax nyieqc aqv loh!
1.53: Ngorc nyei mienh ninh ceix longx nyei ga'naaiv bun nyanc beuv, bun mienh maaih mienh kungx-buoz baeqc zaux nyei mingh.
1.10: Ninh buov hung nyei ziangh hoc, zuangx mienh yiem ga'nyiec daux gaux.
1.2: Zunh doz mienh nyei m'zing buatc naaiv deix sic yiem gorn cuotv wuov zanc yaac zunh mbuox yie mbuo, mienh ziouc ei jienv fiev.
1.1: Zien oix nyei domh gorx, Te^o^fi^latv aac, Yiem yie mbuo gu'nyuoz cuotv liuz nyei sic maaih mienh camv nyei fiev jienv.
1.73: Tin-Hungh laengz ngaengc waac bun mbuo nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv, Apc^laa^ham.
1.24: Nqa'haav E^li^saa^mbetc maaih jienv sin. Ninh ziouc yiem biaa hlaax nyieqc biauv, maiv mingh haaix ndau.
1.16: Ninh oix dorh I^saa^laa^en Mienh camv nyei aengx nzuonx daaih lorz Ziouv, ninh mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh.
1.51: Ninh sung ninh nyei buoz zoux cuotv domh sic, bun maux nyei mienh caux ninh mbuo nyei nyungc-nyungc za'eix faatv nzaanx nzengc mingh.

6.21: Meih mbuo ih zanc ngorc jienv yiem nyei mienh maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc meih mbuo oix duqv nyanc beuv. Meih mbuo ih zanc nyiemv jienv nyei mienh maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc meih mbuo oix duqv jatv.
6.15: Matv^taai, Tomatv, An^fe^atc nyei dorn, Yaagorpc, Simon (dongh mienh heuc, “Hnamv guoqv zaangc” wuov dauh).
6.23: Ninh mbuo hnangv naaiv nor zoux, meih mbuo oix zuqc a'hneiv, njien-youh nyei cangx heix, weic zuqc yiem tin-dorngh maaih meih mbuo nyei domh zingh nyeic. Zoux hoic meih mbuo wuov deix mienh nyei ong-taaix yaac fih hnangv nyei zoux bun douc waac mienh.
6.47: Haaix dauh daaih lorz yie, haiz yie nyei waac yaac ei jienv zoux, yie oix bun meih mbuo hiuv duqv wuov dauh hnangv haaix nor.
6.20: Yesu mangc jienv ninh nyei sai-gorx mbuo ziouc gorngv, “Meih mbuo mienh jomc mienh maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc maaih Tin-Hungh zoux Ziouv gunv meih mbuo.
6.18: daaih muangx Yesu yaac tov ninh zorc ninh mbuo nyei baengc. Zuqc mienv muoqv wuov deix yaac daaih. Yesu zorc longx nzengc.
6.33: Se gorngv meih mbuo kungx zoux longx bun dongh zoux longx bun meih mbuo wuov deix hnangv, Tin-Hungh hnangv haaix nor haih ceix fuqv bun meih mbuo? Hnangv naaic liemh zuiz-mienh yaac haih zoux nyei.
6.43: “Ndiangx longx maiv ziangh maiv benx nyei biouv. Maiv benx nyei ndiangx yaac maiv ziangh longx nyei biouv.
6.48: Ninh se hnangv laanh mienh gomv biauv, wetv duqv ndo, bangc la'bieiv-baengh gu'nguaaic ceix jiez. Wuom yiemx, wuom guaatv, biauv yaac maiv mbaang, weic zuqc ceix duqv wuonv.
6.22: Meih mbuo weic yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, zuqc mienh nzorng, zuqc mienh nqemh, zuqc mienh huotv, yaac zuqc mienh daanh meih mbuo nyei mbuox se orqv haic nyei mbuox, meih mbuo maaih njien-youh aqv.
6.42: Ganh nyei m'zing maaih nqanx ndiangx meih yaac maiv buatc, fungc haih mbuox gorx-youz, ‘Gorx aac, yie tengx gorx ban cuotv m'zing nyei la'fapv oc.’ Beih zaqc hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh aah! Oix zuqc zorqv cuotv ganh nyei m'zing wuov nqanx ndiangx ndaangc, meih ziouc haih mangc duqv zien tengx gorx-youz ban cuotv m'zing nyei la'fapv.
6.31: Meih mbuo oix mienh hnangv haaix nor zoux bun meih mbuo, meih mbuo yaac oix zuqc hnangv wuov nor zoux bun mienh.
6.4: Ndaawitv Hungh bieqc zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei Ndopv-Liuh zorqv gengx Tin-Hungh wuov deix njuov nyanc. Naaiv deix njuov kungx sai mienh ganh maaih leiz nyanc hnangv. Mv baac Ndaawitv nyanc yaac bun gan ninh wuov deix mienh caux jienv nyanc.”
6.29: Mienh mborqv meih nyei naaiv bung hmien, liemh wuov bung hmien yaac huin bun ninh. Mienh zorqv meih nyei domh lui mingh, liemh gu'nyuoz wuov deix sueih ninh zorqv.
6.9: Yesu gorngv, “Yie naaic gaax meih mbuo, ei mbuo nyei leiz, Dingh Gong Hnoi mbuo haih zoux haaix nyungc? Haih zoux longx fai zoux waaic? Njoux maengc fai hoic maengc?”
6.37: “Maiv dungx daanh mienh, Tin-Hungh ziouc maiv daanh meih mbuo. Maiv dungx dingc mienh nyei zuiz, Tin-Hungh ziouc maiv dingc meih mbuo nyei zuiz. Oix zuqc guangc mienh nyei zuiz, Tin-Hungh ziouc guangc meih mbuo nyei zuiz.
6.5: Yesu ziouc mbuox ninh mbuo, “Yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, zoux Dingh Gong Hnoi nyei Ziouv.”
6.3: Yesu dau ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo maiv doqc jiex naaiv deix jauv fai? Ndaawitv Hungh caux gan ninh wuov deix mienh hnyouv sie nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo hnangv haaix nor zoux?
6.39: Yesu aengx gorngv waac-beiv bun ninh mbuo muangx. Ninh gorngv, “M'zing maengh mienh haih ken m'zing maengh mienh fai? Hnangv naaic i dauh zungv haih ndortv kuotv maiv zeiz?
6.6: Aengx maaih norm Dingh Gong Hnoi, Yesu bieqc norm wuic dorngh njaaux mienh. Yiem wuov maaih laanh mienh mbiaauc jieqv buoz waaic mi'aqv.
6.8: Mv baac ninh mbuo hnangv haaix nor hnamv, Yesu hiuv nyei. Ninh mbuox buoz waaic wuov laanh mienh, “Daaih souv naaiv zuangx mienh nyei nza'hmien oc.” Wuov laanh mienh ziouc jiez sin souv jienv wuov aqv.
6.46: “Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc heuc yie, ‘Ziouv aah! Ziouv!’ yaac maiv ei jienv yie mbuox nyei waac zoux?
6.7: Maaih deix njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng caux Faa^li^si Mienh oix lorz jauv gox Yesu ziouc cienh mangc jienv, mangc gaax, Yesu longc Dingh Gong Hnoi zorc baengc fai?
6.32: “Se gorngv meih mbuo kungx hnamv dongh hnamv meih mbuo wuov deix mienh, naaiv maaih haaix nyungc faaux duqv ceng? Liemh zuiz-mienh yaac hnamv dongh hnamv ninh mbuo wuov deix.
6.25: Meih mbuo ih zanc duqv nyanc beuv nyei mienh oix zuqc kouv aqv, weic zuqc meih mbuo oix zuqc ngorc. Meih mbuo ih zanc jatv nyei mienh oix zuqc kouv aqv, weic zuqc meih mbuo oix zuqc nzauh, nyiemv jienv yiem.
6.17: Yesu caux ninh nyei gong-zoh mbuo njiec taux ndau-baengh souv jienv wuov. Yiem wuov aengx maaih ninh nyei sai-gorx camv nyei, yaac maaih mienh camv yiem Yu^ndie Saengv norm-norm dorngx, caux Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh, aengx caux yiem koiv-hlen wuov deix i norm zingh, Tailaqv caux Sai^ndorn,
6.12: Wuov deix ziangh hoc Yesu faaux mbong-aiv mingh daux gaux, yiem wuov ziangh muonz caux Tin-Hungh gorngv waac.
6.34: Se gorngv meih mbuo kungx gaav ga'naaiv bun haih jaauv meih mbuo wuov deix hnangv, Tin-Hungh hnangv haaix nor haih ceix fuqv bun meih mbuo? Liemh zuiz-mienh yaac gaav ga'naaiv bun zuiz-mienh, weic zuqc ninh mbuo hnamv daaih haih duqv ninh mbuo nyei ga'naaiv nzuonx nzengc.
6.30: Haaix dauh tov meih nyei haaix nyungc, oix zuqc bun ninh. Haaix dauh zorqv meih nyei haaix nyungc ga'naaiv mingh yaac maiv dungx lorz nzuonx.
6.11: Wuov deix mienh qiex jiez! haic. Ninh mbuo caangh laangh oix hnangv haaix nor zoux bun Yesu.
6.28: Mienh zioux meih mbuo, oix zuqc buang waac bun ninh mbuo. Zoux doqc meih mbuo wuov deix, oix zuqc tengx ninh mbuo daux gaux.
6.44: Buatc biouv ziouc hiuv duqv biouv-ndiangx se haaix nyungc ndiangx. Mienh maiv mingh ndiangx-njimv gaeqv ngongh nyorx biouv, yaac maiv mingh njimv-mbiorqc gaeqv a'ngunc biouv.
6.45: Kuv mienh nyei hnyouv siou longx nyei ga'naaiv, zorqv cuotv daaih nyei se longx nyei. Mienh waaic mienh nyei hnyouv siou waaic nyei ga'naaiv, zorqv cuotv daaih se waaic nyei. Hnyouv zaangh buangv haaix nyungc, nzuih ziouc gorngv cuotv wuov nyungc.
6.19: Zuangx mienh mbengx jienv mingh oix hluo Yesu, weic zuqc ninh maaih zorc baengc nyei qaqv cuotv mingh tengx ninh mbuo yietc zungv zorc baengc.
6.35: Daaux nzuonx oix zuqc hnamv meih mbuo nyei win-wangv, zoux longx bun ninh mbuo. Gaav ga'naaiv oix zuqc bun ninh mbuo yaac maiv dungx hnamv aengx duqv nzuonx. Hnangv naaiv, meih mbuo oix duqv domh zingh nyeic yaac benx Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei dorn, weic zuqc ninh zoux longx bun maiv maaih en-zingh nyei mienh caux mienh waaic mienh.
6.41: “Meih weic haaix diuc buatc meih nyei gorx-youz nyei m'zing maaih la'fapv, yaac maiv hnamv taux meih ganh nyei m'zing maaih nqanx ndiangx?
6.13: Lungh njang nyei ziangh hoc, ninh heuc ninh nyei sai-gorx mbuo daaih, ziouc ginv cuotv ziepc nyeic dauh, aengx heuc ninh mbuo benx gong-zoh.
6.40: Horqc saeng maiv haih gauh hlo ninh nyei fin-saeng. Horqc saeng hoqc liuz nyungc-nyungc ziouc caux fin-saeng fih hnangv nyei.
6.26: Meih mbuo duqv zuangx mienh ceng meih mbuo longx nyei ziangh hoc, meih mbuo oix zuqc kouv aqv. Ceng meih mbuo wuov deix mienh nyei ong-taaix fih hnangv nyei ceng jaav douc waac mienh.
6.14: Ninh ginv Simon, (aengx tengx ninh cuotv mbuox heuc Bide) caux Bide nyei youz, An^ndaa^lu, aengx maaih Yaagorpc, Yo^han, Filipv, Mbaa^to^lo^miu,
6.27: “Yie mbuox meih mbuo ih zanc muangx jienv nyei mienh, oix zuqc hnamv meih mbuo nyei win-wangv, zoux longx bun nzorng meih mbuo wuov deix.
6.38: Meih mbuo bun haaix nyungc mienh, Tin-Hungh yaac oix winh bun meih mbuo, zungv oix dox bun meih mbuo gauh camv, zatv yuonh, nqamv zietc, hlaau ningx taux yiem maiv jienv. Meih mbuo longc haaix nyungc hlaau bun mienh, Tin-Hungh yaac oix longc wuov nyungc hlaau bun meih mbuo.”
6.49: Mv baac haaix dauh haiz yie nyei waac yaac maiv muangx, maiv ei jienv zoux nor, se hnangv laanh mienh gomv biauv yiem ndau yaac maiv maaih gorn-ndoqv. Wuom yiemx, wuom guaatv, biauv ziouc lomz! lomz nyei mbaang waaic nzengc mi'aqv.”
6.36: Meih mbuo oix zuqc korv-lienh mienh hnangv meih mbuo nyei Zaangc Diex korv-lienh mienh wuov nor.
6.10: Yesu huin mingh mangc ninh mbuo dauh dauh aengx gorngv mbuox buoz waaic wuov laanh mienh, “Sung meih nyei buoz cuotv daaih maah!” Ninh sung buoz cuotv daaih, buoz ziouc longx nzengc mi'aqv.
6.2: Maaih deix Faa^li^si Mienh naaic gaax, “Ei mbuo nyei leiz, Dingh Gong Hnoi maiv horpc zuqc hnangv naaiv nor zoux, meih mbuo weic haaix diuc zoux?”
6.1: Maaih norm Dingh Gong Hnoi, Yesu caux ninh nyei sai-gorx mbuo jiex mienh nyei mbiauh ndeic. Ninh nyei sai-gorx nietv mbiauh dorv nomv nyanc.
6.24: Meih mbuo ih zanc butv zoih nyei mienh oix zuqc kouv aqv, weic zuqc meih mbuo nyei njien-youh meih mbuo duqv liuz aqv.
6.16: Aengx maaih Yaagorpc nyei dorn, Yu^ndaatc, caux maaic Yesu wuov dauh Yu^ndaatc I^saa^kaa^li^otc.

8.21: Yesu gorngv mbuox zuangx mienh, “Yie nyei maa caux yie nyei youz se dongh muangx Tin-Hungh nyei waac yaac ei jienv zoux wuov deix.”
8.15: Ndortv zuqc ndau-longx wuov deix nyim beiv mienh haiz Tin-Hungh nyei kuv fienx, longc hnyouv ziepc zuoqv nyei sienx, yaac longc noic ei jienv zoux, cingx daaih hnangv naaiv deix nyim nor, ziangh duqv gitv.
8.23: Mingh gau, Yesu m'njormh mi'aqv. Liemh zeih borngz gorng domh nziaaux, buonc wuom jiez laangc nqomz bieqc nzangv. Ninh mbuo gengh! gamh nziex haic.
8.47: Wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn muangx haiz bingx maiv mbueiz aqv, ziouc sin zinx jienv nyei daaih mbaapv njiec Yesu nyei zaux-hlen. Ninh dorng jienv zuangx mienh mbuox Yesu ninh weic haaix diuc daaih hluo Yesu nyei lui-juoqv, yaac gorngv ninh nyei baengc liemh zeih longx nzengc mi'aqv.
8.56: Sieqv nyei diex maac mbuoqc horngh haic mv baac Yesu mbuox ninh mbuo, naaiv deix sic maiv dungx gorngv mbuox haaix dauh.
8.20: Maaih mienh mbuox Yesu, “Meih nyei maa caux meih nyei youz souv jienv ga'nyiec maengx zuov oix buangh meih.”
8.18: Hnangv naaic meih mbuo oix zuqc longc hnyouv muangx longx. Weic zuqc haaix dauh maaih nyei, ninh oix jaa duqv gauh camv. Haaix dauh maiv maaih, liemh ninh hnamv daaih ninh maaih nyei diqv dien, zungv oix zorqv mingh.”
8.33: Mienv ziouc cuotv wuov dauh mienh mingh bieqc wuov guanh dungz mi'aqv. Ziangh guanh dungz ziouc tiux njiec kamx ndortv koiv-dorn ziemx daic nzengc mi'aqv.
8.43: Yaac maaih dauh m'sieqv dorn butv baengc-hlutv duqv ziepc nyeic hnyangx. Ninh mingh lorz ndie-sai zorc gau ninh nyei baengc, zaaux nzengc ninh nyei zinh nyaanh, yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh zorc duqv ninh longx.
8.48: Yesu mbuox ninh, “M'dauh m'sieqv dorn aah! Weic zuqc meih sienx yie, meih nyei baengc longx mi'aqv. Gunv baengh orn nyei nzuonx aqv oc.”
8.22: Maaih hnoi nor, Yesu mbuox ninh nyei sai-gorx, “Mbuo mingh wuov ngaanc ziqc koiv-dorn orqc?” Ninh mbuo ziouc bieqc nzangv nzaeng jienv mingh aqv.
8.42: weic zuqc ninh nyei sieqv-ndoqc butv baengc oix daic haic aqv. Naaiv dauh sieqv nyei hnyangx-jeiv leih maiv go ziepc nyeic hnyangx. Yesu gan Yailatv mingh gau, mienh camv! haic mbengx jienv mingh.
8.50: Mv baac Yesu haiz naaiv deix waac ninh ziouc gorngv mbuox Yailatv, “Maiv dungx gamh nziex oc. Kungx oix zuqc sienx hnangv. Meih nyei sieqv ziouc longx daaih aqv.”
8.31: Wuov deix mienv tov Yesu maiv dungx zunc ninh mbuo ndortv ndo haic nyei kuotv.
8.4: Maaih mienh camv! nyei gapv zunv yaac maaih naaiv norm mungv, wuov norm mungv nyei mienh daaih lorz Yesu. Yesu ziouc gorngv waac-beiv bun ninh mbuo muangx.
8.29: Ninh hnangv naaiv nor gorngv weic zuqc Yesu hatc hieh guaiv mienv cuotv wuov dauh mienh nyei sin. Maiv gunv maaih limc ndoh jienv buoz-zaux aengx maaih mienh zuov jienv, duqv ziex nzunc mienv ciouv daaih bun ninh cutv dangx limc aengx zunc ninh mingh wuov deic-bung-huaang.
8.9: Sai-gorx mbuo naaic Yesu, “Naaiv diuh waac-beiv, eix leiz hnangv haaix nor?”
8.37: Yiem Ge^laa^saa Deic nyei zuangx mienh tov Yesu leih nqoi ninh mbuo weic zuqc ninh mbuo gamh nziex haic. Yesu ziouc bieqc nzangv mingh aqv.
8.5: Ninh gorngv, “Maaih laanh mienh cuotv mingh haaz nyim. Haaz gau nyim, maaih deix ndortv zuqc jauv, zuqc mienh caaiv. Norqc yaac daaih nzauz nyanc nzengc.
8.3: Maaih Kusaa nyei auv, Yo^an^naa. Kusaa zoux jien goux nzengc Helotv Hungh nyei jaa-dingh. Aengx maaih Su^sanx^naa caux m'sieqv dorn camv nyei. Ninh mbuo longc ganh maaih nyei ga'naaiv juang Yesu mbuo.
8.39: gorngv mbuox ninh, “Nzuonx ganh nyei biauv aqv. Nzuonx mingh ziux Tin-Hungh tengx meih nyei jauv gorngv nzengc mbuox mienh.” Naaiv dauh mienh ziouc nzuonx mingh ziux Yesu tengx ninh nyei jauv gorngv nzengc bun yietc norm mungv nyei mienh muangx.
8.6: Maaih deix ndortv zuqc la'bieiv-ndau. Nyim zunx daaih maiv lauh ziouc nqaai mi'aqv, weic zuqc maiv lamh baeng wuom.
8.8: Maaih deix nyim ndortv zuqc ndau-longx. Nyim cuotv hlo daaih, yietc gouv siou duqv yietc baeqv gouv.” Gorngv liuz naaiv deix waac, Yesu heuc qiex hlo nyei gorngv, “Haaix dauh maaih m'normh oix zuqc baeng m'normh muangx longx.”
8.46: Mv baac Yesu gorngv, “Gengh maaih mienh hluo zuqc yie nyei lorqc. Yie hiuv nyei, weic zuqc maaih deix yie nyei qaqv cuotv mingh tengx mienh zorc baengc mi'aqv.”
8.7: Maaih deix nyim ndortv zuqc njimv-lomc, zorpc jienv njimv hlo daaih, njimv mbiorngz jienv.
8.32: Maaih yietc domh guanh dungz yiem wuov jiex mbaiv lorz nyanc. Mienv ziouc tov Yesu bun ninh mbuo bieqc wuov guanh dungz. Yesu yaac nqoi nzuih ninh mbuo.
8.25: Yesu naaic ninh nyei sai-gorx mbuo, “Meih mbuo nyei sienx fim jiex haaix mi'aqv?” Mv baac ninh mbuo gamh nziex haic, mbuoqc horngh haic. Laanh ziouc naaic laanh, “Naaiv haaix dauh orqv? Ninh hatc nziaaux hatc wuom, liemh nziaaux caux wuom yaac muangx ninh nyei waac.”
8.17: “Maiv maaih haaix nyungc bingx jienv nyei sic maiv zuqc cuotv yaangh. Maiv maaih haaix nyungc gem jienv mv baac oix maaih mienh hiuv yaac bun mbiaangx yaangh cuotv daaih.
8.12: Ndortv zuqc jauv wuov deix nyim beiv mienh muangx haiz Tin-Hungh nyei kuv fienx. Mv baac mienv nyei hungh daaih caangv cuotv yiem hnyouv wuov deix kuv fienx, bun ninh mbuo maiv haih sienx ziouc maiv duqv njoux.
8.34: Yungz dungz nyei mienh buatc naaiv deix sic cuotv, ninh mbuo ziouc biaux mingh zunh mbuox zingh gu'nyuoz caux zingh ga'nyiec nyei fiuv-laangz nyei mienh muangx.
8.30: Yesu naaic ninh, “Meih nyei mbuox heuc haaix nyungc?” Ninh dau, “Mbuox heuc Guanh,” weic zuqc mienv camv nyei bieqc ninh nyei sin yiem.
8.11: “Naaiv diuh waac-beiv nyei eix leiz se hnangv naaiv. Wuov deix nyim se Tin-Hungh nyei kuv fienx.
8.28: Naaiv dauh mienh yietv buatc Yesu ninh heuc qiex hlo nyei ziouc mbaapv njiec Yesu nyei nza'hmien nauc! nauc nyei gorngv, “Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh nyei Dorn, Yesu aah! Meih daaih yie naaiv zoux haaix nyungc? Tov maiv dungx zeix yie.”
8.44: Ninh ziouc mbengx jienv mingh taux Yesu nyei nqa'haav nqaang hluo Yesu nyei lui-juoqv. Baengc-hlutv ziouc liemh zeih dingh mi'aqv.
8.45: Yesu naaic gaax, “Haaix dauh hluo zuqc yie?” Yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh laengz. Bide ziouc gorngv, “Sai-Diex aah! Mienh camv weih jienv meih, mbengx zuqc meih saah?”
8.19: Yesu nyei maa caux ninh nyei youz mbuo mingh lorz Yesu mv baac mienh camv haic, ninh mbuo bieqc maiv taux ninh wuov.
8.54: Mv baac Yesu nanv jienv wuov dauh sieqv nyei buoz heuc, “Sieqv aah! Jiez sin daaih maah!”
8.35: Mienh haiz liuz naaiv deix sic, ziouc cuotv mingh mangc. Mingh taux Yesu wuov, ninh mbuo buatc wuov dauh mienh zueiz jienv Yesu nyei zaux ga'hlen, zuqv jienv lui-houx yaac nzang daaih aqv. Ninh mbuo ziouc gamh nziex haic.
8.41: Maaih dauh gunv wuic dorngh nyei mienh, mbuox heuc Yailatv, daaih taux. Ninh mbaapv njiec Yesu nyei zaux-hlen njiec qaqv tov Yesu mingh ninh nyei biauv
8.13: Ndortv zuqc la'bieiv-ndau wuov deix nyim beiv mienh muangx haiz kuv fienx ziouc a'hneiv zipv. Mv baac se hnangv kuv fienx njiec nzungh maiv ndo. Sienx maiv lauh, buangh zuqc seix hnyouv nyei sic ziouc cuotv mi'aqv.
8.40: Yesu yiem wuov ngaanc ziqc Gaa^li^li Koiv-Dorn nzuonx daaih, maaih mienh camv nyei a'hneiv nyei zipv weic zuqc ninh mbuo yiem wuov zuov jienv ninh.
8.55: Wuov dauh sieqv ziouc nangh daaih, liemh zeih jiez sin daaih aqv. Yesu ziouc mbuox ninh mbuo lorz ga'naaiv bun wuov dauh fu'jueiv nyanc.
8.26: Yesu caux ninh nyei sai-gorx mbuo nzaeng nzangv mingh taux Ge^laa^saa Deic, Gaa^li^li Koiv-Dorn nyei doix-ngaanc.
8.52: Zuangx mienh yiem ga'nyiec mbiouh mbiouh nyei nyiemv. Yesu gorngv, “Maiv dungx nyiemv aqv. Ninh maiv daic. Ninh m'njormh hnangv.”
8.14: Ndortv zuqc njimv-lomc wuov deix nyim beiv mienh muangx haiz kuv fienx. Zoux gau, laaix seix zaangc kuonx hnyouv nyei sic, fai laaix hnamv zinh nyaanh, fai baamh gen nyei njien-youh nduov ninh mbuo, naaiv deix sic mbiorngz jienv ninh mbuo cingx daaih hnangv maiv haih jauh nyei nyim nor.
8.27: Ninh mbuo cuotv nzangv mingh faaux mbienx wuov zanc, maaih dauh wuov norm mungv nyei mienh daaih buangh zuqc Yesu. Naaiv dauh mienh maaih mienv yiem ninh nyei sin. Lauh haic maiv zuqv lui-houx yaac maiv yiem biauv, kungx yiem wuov zouv-gemh hnangv.
8.38: Dongh mienv cuotv liuz wuov dauh mienh tov Yesu bun ninh gan jienv mingh. Mv baac Yesu heuc ninh nzuonx aqv,
8.49: Yesu corc gorngv jienv waac wuov zanc, maaih dauh mienh yiem wuov dauh gunv wuic dorngh nyei mienh nyei biauv daaih mbuox Yailatv, “Meih nyei sieqv daic mi'aqv. Maiv zuqc daaih la'nyauv fin-saeng aqv oc.”
8.36: Buatc naaiv deix sic cuotv nyei mienh gorngv bun zuangx mienh hiuv duqv zuqc mienv bieqc wuov dauh mienh hnangv haaix nor duqv longx daaih.
8.53: Zuangx mienh ziouc jatv Yesu, weic zuqc ninh mbuo hiuv duqv wuov dauh fu'jueiv za'gengh daic mi'aqv.
8.10: Yesu gorngv, “Tin-Hungh zoux Ziouv gunv mienh naaiv deix gem jienv nyei sic, Tin-Hungh bun meih mbuo hiuv mi'aqv, mv baac ga'nyiec nyei mienh kungx haiz gorngv benx waac-beiv hnangv weic ‘bun ninh mbuo mangc yaac maiv buatc, haiz yaac maiv mengh baeqc.’
8.2: Aengx maaih deix m'sieqv dorn yaac gan jienv mingh. Naaiv deix m'sieqv dorn dongh zinh ndaangc Yesu zunc mienv cuotv yaac zorc longx ninh mbuo nyei baengc wuov deix. Maaih dauh heuc Maa^li^yaa, dongh mienh heuc, Makv^ndaa^laa, wuov dauh. Yesu zunc siec dauh mienv cuotv ninh nyei sin.
8.1: Nqa'haav maiv lauh, Yesu zueih mungv zueih laangz nyei mingh zunh Tin-Hungh zoux Ziouv gunv mienh nyei kuv fienx. Ninh nyei ziepc nyeic dauh sai-gorx yaac caux jienv ninh mingh.
8.24: Sai-gorx mbuo ziouc mingh heuc Yesu nyie daaih. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ziouv aah! Ziouv! Mbuo ndortv wuom daic aqv loh!” Yesu jiez sin hatc nziaaux caux wuom-laangc. Domh nziaaux ziouc dingh, wuom-laangc haapv, sekv nzengc mi'aqv.
8.16: “Maiv maaih haaix dauh diemv zieqc dang aengx zorqv ga'naaiv nqopv jienv fai dorh mingh don coux-ndiev. Dang m'daaih don dang nyei baaih weic bun bieqc biauv nyei mienh mangc duqv buatc njang.
8.51: Mingh taux Yailatv nyei biauv, Yesu maiv bun haaix dauh bieqc. Kungx bun Bide, Yo^han, Yaagorpc caux wuov dauh sieqv nyei diex maac bieqc hnangv.

24.21: Yie mbuo yaac hnamv jienv dongh naaiv dauh oix zuoqc I^saa^laa^en Mienh nzuonx. Yaac maiv daan mbuoqc naaiv hnangv. Naaiv deix sic cuotv liuz duqv buo hnoi aqv.
24.15: Doix ninh mbuo gorngv jienv wuov zanc, Yesu ganh daaih fatv caux jienv ninh mbuo mingh.
24.23: Maiv buatc ninh nyei sei mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo nzuonx daaih gorngv ninh mbuo buatc fin-mienh hinc cuotv daaih mbuox ninh mbuo, Yesu ziangh jienv nyei.
24.47: Oix zuqc dengv ninh nyei mbuox mingh zunh mbuox mienh goiv hnyouv guangc zuiz ziouc duqv Tin-Hungh guangc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz. Oix zuqc yiem Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh jiez gorn zunh cuotv buangv maanc guoqv maanc fingx.
24.20: Yie mbuo nyei sai mienh bieiv caux jien-fouv zorqv ninh jiu bun Janx dingc zuiz daix ninh ziouc dorh ninh mingh ding ziepc nzaangc jaax daic.
24.18: Maaih dauh, mbuox heuc Ken^o^batc, naaic Yesu, “Kungx meih ganh nduqc dauh kaeqv yiem Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh maiv hiuv duqv naaiv deix i ziex hnoi cuotv daaih nyei sic?”
24.33: Ninh mbuo liemh zeih jiez sin nzuonx Ye^lu^saa^lem. Ninh mbuo buatc wuov deix ziepc yietv dauh sai-gorx caux deix ninh mbuo nyei doic gapv zunv wuov,
24.43: Ninh zipv daaih ziouc dorng jienv ninh mbuo nyanc.
24.48: Meih mbuo zoux naaiv deix sic nyei zorng-zengx mienh.
24.22: Mv baac yiem yie mbuo wuov maaih deix m'sieqv dorn zoux bun yie mbuo hnamv maiv mengh baeqc. Ninh mbuo a'ndorm nziouv nyei mingh wuov zouv mangc.
24.42: Ninh mbuo zorqv deix ziqv daaih nyei mbiauz bun ninh.
24.50: Yesu dorh ninh mbuo cuotv mingh taux Mbe^taa^ni Laangz-hlen ziouc cau jienv buoz buang waac ninh mbuo.
24.31: Tin-Hungh bun ninh mbuo i laanh liemh zeih zieqv duqv Yesu, ziang naaic maiv buatc ninh mi'aqv.
24.4: Ninh mbuo souv jienv wuov hnamv maiv mengh baeqc. Liemh zeih maaih i laanh mienh zuqv jienv lui-houx zaengh zaengh nyei souv jienv ninh mbuo nyei ga'hlen.
24.29: Mv baac ninh mbuo qaqv liouh ninh gorngv, “Ih zanc aav lamh hmuangx aqv. Mba'hnoi oix muotv aqv. Caux yie mbuo bueix muonz naaiv maah!” Yesu ziouc bieqc biauv caux ninh mbuo hitv wuov.
24.9: Yiem zouv nzuonx mingh, ninh mbuo zorqv naaiv deix yietc zungv sic mbuox wuov deix ziepc yietv dauh gong-zoh caux ga'hlen nyei zuangx mienh.
24.37: Ninh mbuo laaic buatc janx-daic njoiz mv bei, ziouc haeqv ninh mbuo gamh nziex haic, hnyouv huaang nzengc.
24.5: Wuov deix m'sieqv dorn gamh nziex haic ziouc puoqv njiec ndau. Naaiv deix i laanh mienh naaic ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc daaih naaiv janx-daic yiem nyei dorngx lorz mienh nangh mienh?
24.3: Ninh mbuo ziouc bieqc mingh mangc, maiv buatc Ziouv Yesu nyei sei.
24.39: Samx mangc gaax yie nyei buoz-zaux! Hluo mangc, meih mbuo ziouc hiuv duqv dongh yie aqv. Janx-daic njoiz maiv maaih orv, maiv maaih mbungv hnangv meih mbuo buatc yie maaih nor.”
24.6: Ninh maiv yiem naaiv lorqc. Ninh nangh daaih aqv. Meih mbuo oix zuqc jangx taux ninh yiem Gaa^li^li wuov zanc gorngv mbuox meih mbuo wuov deix waac.
24.8: Wuov deix m'sieqv dorn ziouc jangx zuqc Yesu nyei waac aqv.
24.46: Ninh yaac gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Ging-Sou fiev jienv hnangv naaiv nor gorngv Giduc oix zuqc siouc kouv. Daic mingh taux da'faam hnoi aengx nangh daaih.
24.7: Ninh gorngv, ‘Yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, oix zuqc jiu bun mienh waaic mienh dorh mingh ding ziepc nzaangc jaax. Mv baac da'faam hnoi yie aengx nangh daaih’ wuov deix waac.”
24.32: Laanh mbuox laanh, “Mbuo gan jauv daaih wuov zanc, ninh caux mbuo gorngv waac yaac porv mengh Ging-Sou, mbuo haiz jorm hnyouv haic hnangv maaih douz zieqc jienv nor orqc?”
24.25: Yesu gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo mienh hngongx mienh aah! Douc waac mienh gorngv nyei yietc zungv waac meih mbuo weic haaix diuc sienx ndongc naaic ndanh?
24.17: Yesu naaic gaax ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo gan jienv jauv mingh meih mbuo gorngv haaix nyungc?” Ninh mbuo ziouc dingh jienv, hmien nzauh nzauh wuov.
24.12: Mv baac Bide jiez sin tiux jienv mingh taux zouv, ndoqv njiec ciepv mangc, kungx buatc ndie-damh hnangv. Ninh ziouc daaux nqaang nzuonx, yaac hnamv maiv mengh baeqc naaiv deix sic.
24.34: haiz ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ziouv za'gengh nangh daaih aqv. Ninh hinc bun Simon buatc liuz aqv.”
24.30: Yesu caux ninh mbuo juangc dieh nyanc hnaangx wuov zanc, ninh aengx zorqv njuov daaih laengz zingh liuz Tin-Hungh ziouc maeqv nqoi bun ninh mbuo.
24.11: Mv baac gong-zoh mbuo maiv sienx. Laaic naaiv deix m'sieqv dorn la'guaih gorngv hnangv.
24.28: Mingh aav lamh taux ninh mbuo oix mingh wuov norm laangz, Yesu zoux hnangv oix baeng zaqc nyei jiex.
24.44: Nyanc liuz, ninh mbuox ninh mbuo, “Naaiv deix sic se yie caux meih mbuo yiem wuov zanc yie mbuox jiex meih mbuo. Yiem Mose nyei Leiz-Latc Sou caux Tin-Hungh nyei Douc Waac Mienh nyei Sou caux Singx Nzung ziangv jienv yie wuov deix waac yietc zungv, oix zuqc cuotv daaih doix-diuc nzengc.”
24.45: Yesu ziouc porv nqoi ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv bun ninh mbuo mengh baeqc Ging-Sou.
24.19: Yesu aengx naaic, “Haaix nyungc sic?” Ninh mbuo dau, “Naa^saa^letv Mungv nyei Yesu nyei sic. Ninh zoux dauh douc waac mienh. Yiem Tin-Hungh caux zuangx mienh nyei nza'hmien ninh gorngv nyei waac caux zoux nyei sic maaih domh qaqv.
24.35: Wuov deix i laanh yaac gorngv ninh mbuo yiem jauv zaangc buangh nyei sic yaac gorngv Yesu maeqv njuov wuov zanc ninh mbuo zieqv duqv ninh aqv.
24.41: Mangc liuz ninh mbuo a'hneiv haic, mbuoqc horngh haic, mv baac corc maiv gaengh sienx. Yesu naaic ninh mbuo, “Yiem naaiv maaih nyanc nyei ga'naaiv nyei fai?”
24.13: Dongh naaic hnoi maaih i dauh Yesu nyei sai-gorx mingh norm laangz heuc Em^maa^utc, yiem nitv Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh leih maiv go ziepc yietv gilo jauv.
24.40: Ninh hnangv naaiv nor gorngv yaac bun ninh mbuo mangc ninh nyei buoz-zaux.
24.26: Giduc oix zuqc siouc liuz naaic deix kouv nyei sic cingx daaih bieqc ninh nyei njang-laangc maiv zeiz?”
24.52: Ninh mbuo ziouc yiem wuov baaix ninh, njien-youh a'hneiv nyei nzuonx Ye^lu^saa^lem,
24.14: Gan jauv mingh wuov zanc, ninh mbuo gorngv jienv koqv hoqc cuotv liuz nyei sic mingh.
24.27: Yesu ziouc gorngv mengh Ging-Sou ziangv jienv ninh ganh gorngv nyei joux-joux waac bun ninh mbuo muangx, yiem Mose nyei Leiz-Latc Sou jiez gorn aengx gorngv nzengc Tin-Hungh nyei zuangx Douc Waac Mienh nyei Sou.
24.38: Mv baac Yesu mbuox ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc nzauh faanh? Zoux haaix nyungc maaih hnyouv mbungh mbienv?
24.49: Dongh yie nyei Die laengz bun nyei, yie ganh oix paaiv daaih caux meih mbuo yiem. Mv baac meih mbuo oix zuqc yiem naaiv zingh zuov taux yiem gu'nguaaic daaih nyei qaqv njiec taux meih mbuo.”
24.36: Wuov deix i laanh gorngv jienv naaiv deix jauv wuov zanc, Ziouv Yesu ganh liemh zeih hinc daaih souv jienv ninh mbuo zuangx mienh nyei mbu'ndongx gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo baengh orn aqv oc.”
24.53: yaac zanc-zanc yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv ceng Tin-Hungh.
24.10: Mbuox gong-zoh mbuo wuov deix m'sieqv dorn, dongh Makv^ndaa^laa Mungv wuov dauh Maa^li^yaa caux Yo^an^naa caux Yaagorpc nyei maa, Maa^li^yaa, aengx caux ninh mbuo daaih wuov deix m'sieqv dorn.
24.2: Taux wuov buatc mbaeqc zouv-gaengh wuov kuaaiv la'bieiv tui nqoi mi'aqv.
24.1: Taux wuov norm leiz-baaix nyei da'yietv hnoi lungh ndorm nziouv nyei, lungh mbiouz-mbiouz njang hnangv, wuov deix m'sieqv dorn dorh jienv ninh mbuo mbenc daaih nyei ndie-ndaang mingh Yesu nyei zouv.
24.24: Yie mbuo maaih deix mingh mangc yaac buatc hnangv naaiv deix m'sieqv dorn gorngv nor. Mv baac ninh mbuo maiv buatc Yesu.”
24.16: Ninh mbuo buatc nyei mv baac weic haaix diuc mv bei, ninh mbuo zieqv maiv duqv ninh.
24.51: Buang gau waac, ninh ziouc leih nqoi ninh mbuo, faaux tin-dorngh mi'aqv.

11.21: “Se gorngv maaih dauh mienh henv mienh mbenc nzoih wuoqc ginc zuov jienv ganh nyei biauv, ninh nyei jaa-dingh ziouc baengh orn aqv.
11.15: Mv baac maaih deix gorngv, “Ninh longc mienv nyei hungh, Mbe^en^se^mbun, nyei lingc zunc mienv cuotv.”
11.23: “Haaix dauh maiv gan yie, se caux yie doix-dekc. Haaix dauh maiv tengx yie siou zunv, wuov dauh zoux bun nzaanx nzengc mi'aqv.
11.47: Meih mbuo gengh oix zuqc kouv aqv. Meih mbuo ceix douc waac mienh nyei zouv mv baac naaiv deix douc waac mienh meih mbuo ganh nyei ong-taaix daix daic.
11.20: Mv baac se gorngv yie kaux Tin-Hungh nyei qaqv zunc mienv cuotv, naaiv bun cing Tin-Hungh yiem meih mbuo mbu'ndongx zoux Ziouv aqv.
11.18: Hnangv naaic, se gorngv Saadaan nyei guoqv bun nqoi zoux ziex guanh, naaiv guanh caux wuov guanh mborqv jaax, ninh nyei guoqv hnangv haaix nor haih yiem duqv wuonv? Meih mbuo gorngv yie longc Mbe^en^se^mbun mienv nyei lingc zunc mienv cuotv.
11.33: “Maiv maaih haaix dauh diemv zieqc dang daaih dorh mingh bingx jienv, fai zorqv tongv nqopv jienv. Dang m'daaih oix zuqc don dang nyei baaih bun bieqc biauv nyei mienh mangc duqv buatc njang.
11.43: “Meih mbuo Faa^li^si Mienh aah! Meih mbuo oix buangh zuqc kouv aqv. Meih mbuo yiem wuic dorngh oix zueiz longx jiex nyei dorngx. Yiem hei-horngc yaac oix mienh zorqv yieqv taaih meih mbuo.
11.48: Hnangv naaic meih mbuo biux mengh meih mbuo a'hneiv meih mbuo nyei ong-taaix zoux nyei sic, weic zuqc ninh mbuo daix naaiv deix douc waac mienh, meih mbuo yaac tengx ceix zouv.
11.22: Mv baac se gorngv maaih dauh gauh henv daaih mborqv hingh, ninh ziouc zorqv nzengc dongh wuov dauh bangc weic goux jaa-dingh nyei wuoqc ginc. Caangv duqv daaih nyei ga'naaiv yaac dorh mingh bun nqoi.
11.42: “Meih mbuo Faa^li^si Mienh aah! Meih mbuo oix buangh zuqc kouv aqv. Meih mbuo dorh baeqc citv caux yienh si caux nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv-ndaang ziepc gouv nyei yietc gouv fongc horc Tin-Hungh. Mv baac zoux baengh fim nyei jauv caux hnamv Tin-Hungh nyei jauv meih mbuo la'kuqv maiv zoux. Meih mbuo horpc zuqc zoux naaiv deix jauv mv baac maiv dungx la'kuqv ziepc gouv nyei yietc gouv ga'naaiv fongc horc Tin-Hungh.
11.50: Hnangv naaiv, ih jaax mienh zuqc dingc zuiz se laaix ninh mbuo nyei ong-taaix daix zuangx douc waac mienh bun nziaamv liouc cuotv, yiem zeix lungh zeix ndau taux ih zanc,
11.31: Taux Tin-Hungh siemv zuiz wuov hnoi, yiem naamh bung maengx wuov dauh hungh maac oix souv jiez daaih gox ih jaax mienh, weic zuqc wuov dauh hungh maac yiem lungh gorn daaih muangx Saa^lo^morn Hungh cong-mengh nyei waac. Mangc maah! Yiem naaiv maaih dauh gauh hlo jiex Saa^lo^morn.
11.4: Tov guangc yie mbuo zoux nyei zuiz, weic zuqc haaix dauh dorngc yie mbuo, yie mbuo yaac guangc bun ninh mbuo. Maiv dungx bun yie mbuo buangh seix hnyouv nyei sic.’+”
11.29: Mienh gunv zoux gunv camv daaih gapv zunv wuov zanc, Yesu gorngv, “Ih jaax hnoi nyei mienh gengh waaic haic. Ninh mbuo kungx tov jangx-hoc mangc mv baac cuotv liuz Yonaa wuov nyungc jangx-hoc, yie maiv bun haaix nyungc jangx-hoc ninh mbuo mangc.
11.9: “Hnangv naaic yie mbuox meih mbuo, oix zuqc tov ziouc duqv. Oix zuqc lorz ziouc buatc. Oix zuqc ngaengv gaengh, gaengh ziouc nqoi.
11.37: Yesu gorngv baac waac, maaih dauh Faa^li^si Mienh heuc Yesu mingh caux ninh nyanc hnaangx. Yesu ziouc bieqc biauv zueiz jienv nyanc hnaangx.
11.5: Yesu aengx gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Se gorngv meih mbuo maaih dauh ndaamv muonz bienx seix mingh taux loz-gaeng doic nyei biauv mbuox ninh, ‘Loz-gaeng aah! Tov gaav buo norm njuov bun yie oc.
11.3: Yie mbuo hnoi-hnoi qiemx nyei nyanc hopv, tov bun yie mbuo yietc hnoi maaih gaux yietc hnoi nyanc.
11.39: Ziouv ziouc gorngv mbuox ninh, “Meih mbuo Faa^li^si Mienh nzaaux nzormc yienv kungx nzaaux ga'nyiec nzengc hnangv. Mv baac meih mbuo gu'nyuoz zaangh buangv meih mbuo mauv daaih nyei ga'naaiv caux hiuang orqv.
11.6: Yie maaih dauh loz-biuv doic jiex jauv koqv hoqc taux daaih hitv yie wuov, yie yaac maiv maaih haaix nyungc bun ninh nyanc.’
11.8: Yie mbuox meih mbuo, maiv zeiz laaix daav loz-gaeng oix jiez sin zorqv haaix nyungc bun ninh, mv baac weic ninh tov duqv nyouh haic cingx daaih jiez sin zorqv ninh qiemx zuqc nyei ga'naaiv bun.
11.46: Yesu dau, “Meih mbuo njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng yaac oix zuqc kouv aqv. Meih mbuo zorqv hniev nyei, aqc duqv nyiex nyei ga'naaiv paanx bun mienh nyiex. Mv baac meih mbuo ganh liemh maiv longc yietc norm buoz-ndoqv tengx ninh mbuo bouh.
11.7: “Yiem biauv gu'nyuoz wuov dauh loz-gaeng ziouc dau, ‘Maiv dungx daaih ging-ceuv yie aqv. Yie mbuo guon jienv gaengh. Hmuangv doic yietc zungv bueix nzengc. Yie maiv haih jiez sin zorqv haaix nyungc bun meih aqv lorqc.’
11.32: Taux Tin-Hungh siemv zuiz wuov hnoi, Ni^naa^we Mienh oix souv jiez daaih gox ih jaax mienh, weic zuqc Yonaa mingh zunh doz wuov zanc ninh mbuo zungv goiv hnyouv guangc zuiz mi'aqv. Mangc maah! Ih zanc yiem naaiv corc maaih dauh gauh hlo jiex Yonaa.
11.25: Ninh ziouc nzuonx mingh buatc ninh nyei loz-biauv puotv njang nzengc, mbenc sung nyei.
11.17: Mv baac ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv hnangv haaix nor hnamv, Yesu hiuv nyei. Ninh ziouc gorngv, “Haaix norm guoqv bun nqoi zoux ziex jauv, ganh nyei guoqv zaangc mienh caux ganh nyei guoqv zaangc mienh mborqv jaax, wuov norm guoqv ziouc baaic nzengc aqv. Se gorngv yietc biauv mienh mborqv jaax bun nqoi, jaa-dingh ziouc baaic nzengc aqv.
11.12: Dorn tov jaux, meih oix bun ziepc nyeic ndaangh ninh fai?
11.34: Meih nyei m'zing beiv sin nyei dang. Meih nyei m'zing njang nor, ziangh sin ziouc njang nzengc. Mv baac m'zing maiv njang, meih nyei sin ziouc hmuangx nzengc mi'aqv.
11.30: Yonaa hnangv haaix nor benx jangx-hoc bun Ni^naa^we Mienh mangc, yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, yaac oix hnangv wuov nor benx jangx-hoc bun ih jaax hnoi nyei mienh mangc.
11.11: “Meih mbuo haaix dauh zoux die nyei mienh, dorn tov mbiauz meih oix bun naang ninh fai?
11.28: Yesu dau, “Dongh haiz Tin-Hungh nyei waac yaac ei jienv zoux wuov deix, gauh maaih njien-youh.”
11.44: Meih mbuo oix zuqc kouv aqv. Meih mbuo se hnangv maiv maaih jangx-hoc nyei janx-daic zouv. Mienh caaiv zuqc yaac liemh maiv hiuv caaiv zuqc janx-daic zouv.”
11.45: Maaih dauh njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng gorngv, “Fin-Saeng aah! Meih hnangv naaiv nor gorngv, meih liemh yie mbuo yaac gorngv doqc niaa.”
11.19: Se gorngv yie kaux Mbe^en^se^mbun mienv zunc mienv cuotv, wuov nyungc meih mbuo nyei sai-gorx kaux haaix dauh nyei lingc zunc mienv cuotv? Meih mbuo nyei sai-gorx zoux nyei sic bun cing meih mbuo dorngc aqv.
11.54: oix nduov ninh gorngv dorngc waac weic longc ninh nyei waac gox ninh.
11.35: Hnangv naaiv meih oix zuqc mbungh jienv maiv dungx bun meih nyei sin nyei njang hmuangx.
11.41: Oix zuqc zorqv yiem meih mbuo nyei nzormc yienv gu'nyuoz wuov deix ga'naaiv fungx mienh jomc mienh, meih mbuo nyei yietc zungv ziouc cing-nzengc mi'aqv.
11.13: Meih mbuo ndongc naaic waaic nyei mienh zungv hiuv duqv bun longx nyei ga'naaiv meih mbuo nyei fu'jueiv, meih mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex corc gauh oix ceix Singx Lingh bun tov ninh wuov deix mienh.”
11.40: Ga'naaiv-hngongx aah! Tin-Hungh zeix cuotv ga'nyiec maengx yaac maiv zeiz aengx zeix cuotv gu'nyuoz maengx?
11.26: Ninh ziouc aengx mingh lorz siec dauh mienv gauh ciouv jiex ninh, daaih caux jienv ninh bieqc wuov laanh mienh nyei sin yiem. Wuov laanh mienh ziouc gauh kouv jiex zinh ndaangc aqv.”
11.52: “Meih mbuo njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng oix zuqc kouv aqv, weic zuqc meih mbuo zorqv koi wuonh zaang wuov norm biauv nyei forv-zeih siou jienv. Meih mbuo ganh maiv bieqc. Mienh oix bieqc meih mbuo yaac laanh jienv maiv bun bieqc.”
11.14: Yesu zunc ga'naaiv-hngongx mienv cuotv mienh nyei sin. Mienv cuotv mingh, wuov laanh mienh ziouc haih gorngv waac aqv. Zuangx mienh mbuoqc horngh haic.
11.27: Yesu gorngv jienv naaiv deix waac wuov zanc, wuov guanh mienh maaih dauh m'sieqv dorn heuc jienv mbui nyei gorngv mbuox Yesu, “Yungz meih daaih aengx bun nyorx meih hopv wuov dauh maaih njien-youh aqv.”
11.38: Wuov dauh Faa^li^si Mienh buatc Yesu nyanc hnaangx, maiv ei jienv leiz nzaaux buoz ndaangc, ninh mbuoqc horngh haic aqv.
11.49: Weic naaiv Tin-Hungh longc ninh nyei cong-mengh gorngv, ‘Yie oix paaiv douc waac mienh yaac paaiv gong-zoh mingh taux ninh mbuo naaic. Maaih deix ninh mbuo oix daix daic. Maaih deix ninh mbuo oix zoux doqc.’
11.36: Se gorngv meih nyei sin maaih njang buangv nzengc, maiv maaih yietc norm dorngx hmuangx, yietc zungv ziouc njang, hnangv maaih dang nyei njang ziux jienv meih nor.”
11.53: Yesu yiem wuov cuotv daaih, njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng caux Faa^li^si Mienh caux ninh doix-dekc nzaeng, qaqv lorz jauv naaic,
11.10: Weic zuqc haaix dauh tov ziouc duqv. Haaix dauh lorz ziouc buatc. Haaix dauh ngaengv gaengh, gaengh ziouc nqoi.
11.2: Yesu ziouc mbuox ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo haaix zanc daux gaux oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor gorngv, ‘Zaangc Diex aah! Tov bun mienh taaih meih nyei cing-nzengc mbuox. Tov bun meih zoux Ziouv gunv mienh nyei hnoi taux.
11.1: Maaih hnoi Yesu yiem norm dorngx daux gaux. Daux gaux liuz, maaih dauh ninh nyei sai-gorx gorngv mbuox ninh, “Ziouv aac, tov njaaux yie mbuo daux gaux hnangv Yo^han njaaux ninh nyei sai-gorx mbuo nor.”
11.24: “Maaih hieh guaiv mienv yiem mienh nyei sin cuotv daaih wuov zanc, ninh youh jienv deic-bung-haanz mingh lorz dorngx hitv. Mingh gau, lorz maiv duqv dorngx hitv. Mienv ziouc gorngv, ‘Aa, yie oix nzuonx yie nyei loz-biauv yiem aqv.’
11.16: Aengx maaih deix mienh oix seix Yesu ziouc tov ninh bun norm yiem tin-dorngh daaih nyei jangx-hoc.
11.51: dongh yiem daix Aa^mbaen wuov doic mienh aengx taux daix Se^kaa^li^yaa yiem ziec-dorngh caux Cing-Nzengc nyei Dorngx mbu'ndongx. Yie mbuox meih mbuo, ih jaax mienh oix zuqc laaix naaiv deix yietc zungv zuqc dingc zuiz.

16.21: zuov hnaangx-hmeiv-ndortv nyanc. Juv yaac daaih mbiec ninh nyei faang.
16.15: Yesu ziouc gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo zoux nyei sic bun mienh laaic meih mbuo zoux duqv horpc, mv baac Tin-Hungh hiuv duqv meih mbuo nyei hnyouv. Weic zuqc baamh mienh funx jaaix nyei, ei Tin-Hungh mangc se maiv zic zinh.
16.12: Se gorngv meih mbuo goux ganh dauh nyei ga'naaiv maiv zingx, meih mbuo ganh horpc zuqc duqv nyei ga'naaiv, haaix dauh oix bun meih mbuo?
16.17: Lungh caux ndau jiex nzengc corc gauh hungh hec Leiz-Latc ndortv yietc dimv yietc waeqc nzaangc.
16.30: “Butv-zoih mienh aengx dau Apc^laa^ham, ‘Ong aac, mbuoqc naaiv maiv gaux. Se gorngv maaih laanh mienh daic mingh aengx nangh daaih mingh taux yie nyei muoz-doic wuov, muoz-doic zungv oix goiv hnyouv guangc zuiz.’
16.20: “Aengx maaih dauh ndortv naanc mienh, mbuox heuc Laa^saa^latv, butv faang butv laaix buangv nzengc yietc sin. Mienh zanc-zanc dorh ninh mingh taux wuov dauh butv-zoih mienh nyei gaengh ndaangc
16.4: Aa, yie hiuv duqv horpc zuqc hnangv haaix nor zoux. Nqa'haav naaiv nyungc gong yie maiv duqv zoux mv baac corc haih maaih deix mienh zipv yie yiem ninh mbuo nyei biauv.’
16.28: Yie corc maaih biaa muoz-dorn yiem wuov. Tov bun Laa^saa^latv mingh kuinx ninh mbuo maiv dungx daaih naaiv siouc kouv nyei dorngx.’
16.19: “Maaih dauh domh butv-zoih mienh zuqv ciouh zuqv dunc nyei lui-houx hnangv. Hnoi-hnoi nyanc orv hopv diuv njien-youh haic.
16.18: “Haaix dauh leih ninh nyei auv aengx mingh longc siang-auv, ninh se hienx auv hnangv. Haaix dauh longc auv-leih zoux auv, wuov dauh se kungx hienx auv hnangv.
16.22: “Zoux gau, naaiv dauh ndortv naanc mienh daic mi'aqv. Fin-mienh dorh ninh mingh caux ninh nyei ong-taaix-ngaeqv, Apc^laa^ham, yiem. “Butv-zoih mienh yaac daic mi'aqv, biopv jienv.
16.23: Ninh mingh yiem yiemh gen zuqc diev mun diev kouv. Ninh ziouc cau hmien buatc Apc^laa^ham yiem go nyei, yaac buatc Laa^saa^latv caux Apc^laa^ham yiem wuov.
16.13: “Maiv maaih haaix dauh haih zoux duqv i dauh ziouv nyei bou. Hnangv naaic ninh oix nzorng naaiv dauh, oix hnamv wuov dauh. Maiv zei aeqv, ninh oix taaih naaiv dauh, oix mangc piex wuov dauh. Meih mbuo maiv haih dongh dangh zoux Tin-Hungh nyei bou yaac zoux nyaanh nyei bou.”
16.9: Yesu aengx gorngv, “Yie mbuox meih mbuo, oix zuqc longc baamh gen maiv baengh fim nyei zinh nyaanh ziu gorx-youz. Taux zinh nyaanh nzengc mi'aqv, meih mbuo ziouc duqv Tin-Hungh zipv mingh yiem yietc liuz nyei biauv.
16.26: Corc aengx maaih nyungc. Maaih diuh domh zuonx maanc zungx ndo nqaeqv jienv. Haaix dauh yiem naaiv bung oix jiex meih mbuo wuov bung, jiex maiv duqv. Haaix dauh yiem wuov bung oix jiex yie mbuo naaiv bung yaac jiex maiv duqv.’
16.5: “Ninh ziouc heuc qiemx ninh nyei ziouv nyei zaeqv wuov deix zoqc dauh, zoqc dauh nyei daaih. Ninh naaic gaax da'yietv dauh, ‘Meih qiemx yie nyei ziouv nyei zaeqv mbu'ziex?’
16.27: “Butv-zoih mienh aengx gorngv, ‘Ong aac, wuov nyungc tov meih paaiv Laa^saa^latv mingh taux yie nyei die nyei biauv.
16.14: Faa^li^si Mienh hnamv nyaanh, ninh mbuo haiz Yesu gorngv naaiv deix waac ninh mbuo ziouc kuh jatv haic Yesu aqv.
16.3: “Wuov dauh gunv gong mienh yiem hnyouv hnamv, ‘Yie oix zuqc hnangv haaix nor zoux? Yie nyei ziouv maiv longc yie zoux gong aqv. Yie wetv ndau, youc maiv maaih qaqv. Tov nyanc, yie yaac diev maiv duqv nyaiv.
16.7: “Ninh aengx naaic da'nyeic dauh, ‘Meih ni? Qiemx mbu'ziex?’ “Wuov dauh dau, ‘Yietc baeqv mbuoqc cuqv.’ “Gunv gong mienh gorngv, ‘Naaiv meih nyei zaeqv-daan. Fiev betv ziepc mbuoqc hnangv.’
16.10: “Haaix dauh yiem faix-fiuv sic zoux duqv zingx, yiem hlo nyei sic yaac zoux duqv zingx. Se gorngv faix-fiuv sic zoux maiv zingx, hlo nyei sic yaac zoux maiv zingx aqv.
16.2: Ninh ziouc heuc ninh nyei gunv gong mienh daaih naaic, ‘Yie haiz mienh gorngv meih naaiv deix sic hnangv haaix nor? Zorqv nzengc meih gunv gong nyei zaeqv-daan daaih bun yie mangc gaax maah! Yiem naaiv mingh meih maiv duqv zoux yie nyei gunv gong mienh aqv.’
16.1: Yesu gorngv mbuox ninh nyei sai-gorx, “Maaih dauh butv-zoih mienh, mienh aengx daaih gox ninh gorngv, ninh nyei gunv gong mienh la'guaih zaaux ninh nyei zinh nyaanh.
16.31: “Apc^laa^ham gorngv, ‘Se gorngv ninh mbuo maiv muangx Mose caux Tin-Hungh nyei Douc Waac Mienh nyei waac nor, maiv gunv maaih laanh mienh daic mingh aengx nangh daaih, ninh mbuo yaac maiv muangx lorqc.’+”
16.6: “Wuov dauh dau, ‘Qiemx yietc baeqv tongv ga'lanv youh.’ “Gunv gong mienh mbuox ninh, ‘Naaiv meih nyei zaeqv-daan. Nqongh zueiz njiec fiev hmz ziepc tongv hnangv.’
16.8: “Wuov dauh butv-zoih mienh ziouc ceng hnyouv maiv zingx wuov dauh gunv gong mienh zoux duqv guai haic. Weic zuqc yiem naaiv lungh ndiev nyei mienh caux ninh mbuo ganh nyei wuov doic mienh zoux gauh guai jiex yiem njang zong wuov jauv mienh.”
16.24: Ninh ziouc heuc Apc^laa^ham, ‘Ong aah! Tov korv-lienh yie, mbuox Laa^saa^latv daaih longc buoz-ndoqv coqv wuom daaih ndiepv yie nyei mbietc laangh deix, weic zuqc yiem naaiv douz buov jienv yie mun haic, kouv haic.’
16.25: “Apc^laa^ham dau ninh, ‘Fun aac, meih oix zuqc jangx taux meih yiem seix zaangc wuov zanc meih nyungc-nyungc yaac duqv longx haic. Laa^saa^latv yaac kungx duqv waaic nyei hnangv. Ih zanc Laa^saa^latv duqv longx, njien-youh haic aqv. Daaux nzuonx meih ih zanc zuqc siouc kouv.
16.29: “Apc^laa^ham dau, ‘Ninh mbuo zungv maaih Mose caux Tin-Hungh nyei Douc Waac Mienh nyei Sou niaa. Meih nyei muoz-doic oix zuqc muangx ninh mbuo nyei waac.’
16.11: Se gorngv baamh gen nyei zinh nyaanh meih mbuo goux maiv zingx, haaix dauh oix bun meih mbuo goux zien zinh zoih?
16.16: “Mose nyei Leiz caux Tin-Hungh nyei Douc Waac Mienh fiev daaih nyei Sou mienh zunh jienv daaih taux Yo^han. Yiem naaic daaih, zunh Tin-Hungh nyei guoqv nyei kuv fienx. Mienh yaac caangv jienv bieqc Tin-Hungh nyei guoqv.
